Container.Name: pd_zurg
Container.Overview: Stream torrents directly to Plex/Emby/Jellyfin/Infuse through Debrid Services, using Plex Discover Watchlists, Trakt lists, and Overseerr. Leverages plex_debrid, zurg, and rclone combined in a single Docker image for faster deployment.

Config.Name: Path: /config
Config.Description: Required: Stores configuration files for pd_zurg, Zurg, rclone, etc. Create this directory if it doesn't exist. See the GitHub guide for configuration instructions.

Config.Name: Path: /cache
Config.Description: Optional: Cache directory for rclone. Improves performance for cloud storage. Create this directory if you want to use rclone caching.

Config.Name: ZURG_ENABLED
Config.Description: Required: Enable Zurg (torrent client) functionality. Set to 'false' to disable Zurg if you only want to use plex_debrid.

Config.Name: RD_API_KEY
Config.Description: MANDATORY: Your RealDebrid API key. Obtain this from your RealDebrid account settings.

Config.Name: ZURG_LOG_LEVEL
Config.Description: Optional: Set the level of detail for Zurg's logs (INFO, DEBUG, WARNING, ERROR). Refer to the GitHub guide for logging instructions.

Config.Name: ZURG_UPDATE
Config.Description: Optional: Enable automatic updates for Zurg. Disable if you want to manually manage updates.

Config.Name: PLEX_REFRESH
Config.Description: Optional: Automatically refresh your Plex library after downloads. Disable if you prefer manual refreshes.

Config.Name: PLEX_MOUNT_DIR
Config.Description: Optional: Set the mount directory for Plex within the container (default: /realdebrid). Usually, you don't need to change this.

Config.Name: RCLONE_MOUNT_NAME
Config.Description: Required: Name for the rclone mount within the container. Usually, you don't need to change this.

Config.Name: RCLONE_LOG_LEVEL
Config.Description: Optional: Set the level of detail for rclone's logs (INFO, DEBUG, WARNING, ERROR). Refer to the rclone documentation for logging details.

Config.Name: RCLONE_DIR_CACHE_TIME
Config.Description: Optional: Time to cache directory entries for rclone (default: 10 seconds). Increase this for slower connections.

Config.Name: RCLONE_VFS_CACHE_MODE
Config.Description: Optional: Set the VFS cache mode for rclone (off, minimal, writes, full). 'full' is recommended for better performance with WebDAV remotes like RealDebrid.

Config.Name: RCLONE_VFS_CACHE_MAX_SIZE
Config.Description: Optional: Maximum size of the rclone VFS cache. Set this according to your available disk space.

Config.Name: PD_ENABLED
Config.Description: Required: Enable plex_debrid (torrent streaming) functionality. Set to 'false' to disable plex_debrid if you only want to use Zurg.

Config.Name: PD_UPDATE
Config.Description: Optional: Enable automatic updates for plex_debrid. Disable if you want to manually manage updates.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: Optional: User ID (UID) for the container to run as. This should match the UID of the user who owns the media directories on your Unraid server. See the Unraid documentation for user management.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Optional: Group ID (GID) for the container to run as. This should match the GID of the group that has access to the media directories on your Unraid server. See the Unraid documentation for user management.

Config.Name: TZ
Config.Description: Optional: Timezone for the container (default: UTC). Set to your local timezone (e.g., America/New_York) to ensure accurate timestamps in logs and downloads.
